mapper.select: select * from Student order by createDate desc
select * from Student where name=#{name} and phoneNumOne=#{phoneNumOne}
select top 1 studentCode from Student where studentCode like '%'+#{studentCode}+'%' order by studentCode desc
select top 1 applyNum from Student order by applyNum desc
select * from student where id in(select studentId from stuCourse group by studentId having count(*) >=#{theGreaterNum})
mapper.update: update Student set campusName = #{campusName},schoolName=#{schoolName},studentCode=#{studentCode},name=#{name},sex=#{sex},parentName=#{parentName},phoneNumOne=#{phoneNumOne},phoneNumTwo=#{phoneNumTwo}, gradeName=#{gradeName},payCondition=#{payCondition},prices=#{prices},state=#{state} where id=#{id}
update Student set openId = #{openId},formId=#{formId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(id) from Student where payCondition=#{payCondition}
